Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize.  Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.

Decimal value for Proposed Percent Complete of the Project Task selected.  This value can be set via the Timesheet under certain condition and is then copied to the Project Task on Approval of the Timesheet.
An optional memo for the Timesheet line.
Time allocation percent for a Project Worksheet Line.  Indicates the percentage of time an employee spent on an activity for the specific time period.   Applies to Project Worksheets only.
